stimulusHtml: Katieâ€™s demand for chocolate bars is perfectly inelastic at a quantity of one per week. Maximiliano will consume three chocolate bars per week when the price is $1, and he will consume four per week when the price is $0.50. Katie and Maximiliano are the only consumers of chocolate bars. Which of the following best describes the price elasticity of market demand beginning at the price of $0.50 and ending at the price of $1 ?
